section:
The approaching vessel at first appears to be an innocent merchantman, but then your lookout points to the banks of oars. ‘A pirate galley!’ he cries. Sure enough, at that moment the ship hoists the red pennant of the Kingdom of the Reavers. Her oars give her a good burst of speed over short distances, and she is soon bearing down on you.
Make a run for it Parley Fight it out
